title: Can HDMI break your phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, but Samsung broke my HDMI. HDMI on the USB port (MHL) was in all Samsung Phones before the Samsung Galaxy S7. I could plug my phone into a projector using an MHL to HDMI adapter cable and watch a movie on my phone comfortably. (Amazon.com: Premium MHL Micro USB HDMI TV Adapter Cable for Samsung Galaxy S5 Active SM-G870: Computers & Accessories) But, this question gets my Dumb Quora Question of the Day award. How on Earth can you imagine connecting your phone to an HDMI monitor without an adapter made for that purpose?
